name: Snow Problem (matt-m)
description:
You're a snowball strolling through a typical puzzle platformer, but there's a problem: as you move, you get bigger and heavier. You begin to lose your speed and jumping ability. Can you make it through all the levels despite these setbacks?

Controls:

movement - WASD, arrow keys, or controller
reset - R on keyboard
